segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a soggy nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, drenching everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading across the floor looks gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's standing right in it, her apron probably soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, waiting to get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids climbing for cookies in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's unstable, but they're ignoring the slop below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place smells like wet wood already, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside is clean, but inside it's filthy chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unclean disaster build up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that tap before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
